definition: To register or enroll yourself for a specific activity or event, typically involving providing personal information and contact details. This term is commonly used when referring to signing up for courses, workshops, or any kind of organized event where participation requires prior registration.

examples.german: Du meldest dich f端r den Kurs an.
examples.english: You sign up for the course.
